sense.def:
A revision of something
je spreminjanje nečesa z namenom, da bi postalo boljše.

seg.quote: They're discussing a complete revision of the timetable.
The Shops Act is in need of revision.

sense.def:
To do revision
pomeni spet prebrati snov, da bi jo na izpitu bolje znali.

seg.quote: I've got to do some revision.
